statements: UPDATE vulnerability_tracking SET severity_level='High', patched=true WHERE vulnerability_id = 1;
UPDATE vulnerability_tracking SET patch_description='Security patch released', affected_system='Windows Server' WHERE vulnerability_id = 2;
UPDATE vulnerability_tracking SET severity_level='High', patched=true WHERE vulnerability_id=101
UPDATE vulnerability_tracking SET patched=false, patch_description='Patch released for critical vulnerability' WHERE vulnerability_name='SQL Injection'
UPDATE vulnerabilities SET severity='Medium', description='Updated severity to Medium' WHERE vulnerability_name='XSS Vulnerability';
UPDATE patches SET patch_description='This patch fixes the security vulnerability', patch_date='2023-08-15' WHERE patch_name='Patch for XSS Vulnerability';
UPDATE vulnerabilities SET vulnerability_name = 'SQL Injection', severity = 'High', affected_systems = 50 WHERE vulnerability_id = 'a1b07f73-09e9-4b8e-bdc6-86e16d02750e';

UPDATE patches SET patch_name = 'Patch Update 1', patch_date = '2022-10-15', patch_description = 'Security patch for critical vulnerability', patched_vulnerability_id = 'a1b07f73-09e9-4b8e-bdc6-86e16d02750e' WHERE patch_id = '7fd8dfdf-d475-43aa-b5b0-9b0b51a69a97';
UPDATE vulnerabilities SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE name = 'SQL Injection'
UPDATE patches SET applied = TRUE, applied_at = '2022-09-15T12:30:00Z' WHERE vulnerability_id = 1
UPDATE vulnerabilities SET severity='Critical', description='This vulnerability requires immediate attention' WHERE vulnerability_id = 1;
UPDATE patches SET applied=true, applied_at='2022-01-15 10:30:00+00' WHERE patch_id = 3;
UPDATE vulnerabilities SET severity_level = 'High' WHERE vulnerability_id = 1;
UPDATE patches SET patch_name = 'Patch1' WHERE patch_id = 2;
UPDATE patches SET patch_timestamp='2022-08-15 10:30:00', patch_name='Patch Update 1' WHERE patch_id=1;
UPDATE vulnerability_reports SET report_timestamp='2022-09-20 15:45:00', report_name='Security Report Updated' WHERE vulnerability_id=4;
UPDATE vulnerabilities SET severity = 'high', description = 'Updated description for high severity vulnerability' WHERE vulnerability_id = 1;
UPDATE patches SET patch_date = '2022-09-15', description = 'Updated patch description for new release', affected_vulnerability_id = 2 WHERE patch_id = 3;
UPDATE vulnerabilities SET description = 'Updated Description: XSS vulnerability fixed', severity = 'high' WHERE vulnerability_name = 'XSS Vulnerability';

UPDATE patches SET patch_date = '2022-02-15', description = 'Critical security update released', affected_vulnerability_id = (SELECT vulnerability_id FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_name = 'SQL Injection Vulnerability') WHERE patch_name = 'SQL Injection Patch';
